overview:
As CEO, Tauno runs all of the operations, management, administration, and business development at ASI. Heâ€™s also in touch on a regular basis with all of ASIâ€™s portfolio companies.

Prior to ASI, Tauno served as the Vice-Chancellor for the Ministry of Finance of Estonia. At the ministry he was responsible for, among other things, the merger of the Taxation and Customs Boards of Estonia, a complex and celebrated milestone for the administration. He also has strong executive management experience from the banking and industrial sectors.

He holds an M.Sc. degree from Tallinn Technical University.
